title: Peranakan Museum: Exploring Culture and Heritage
blurb: Discover Peranakan culture through art and exhibitions.
description: The Peranakan Museum showcases the rich cultural heritage of the Peranakan community through a diverse collection of artifacts, textiles, and interactive exhibits. Visitors can explore the unique traditions, customs, and artistry of the Peranakan people, gaining insights into their history and cultural significance. The museum offers a family-friendly environment with engaging displays suitable for all ages. Explore the Peacock Power exhibition, showcasing beauty and symbolism across cultures. Daily guided tours are available to enhance your visit and provide deeper understanding of the exhibits. The museum aims to preserve and promote Peranakan culture for future generations.
Keyword_tag: Peranakan Museum, culture, heritage, exhibitions, art, traditions, customs, artistry, Peacock Power, guided tours

title: Peranakan Museum Special Exhibition: Peacock Power
blurb: Beauty and Symbolism Across Cultures exhibition.
description: With its dazzling feathers and spectacular tail, the peacock has long symbolised beauty, power, and divinity across Asia. Its image travelled widely, inspiring sacred imagery, luxury ornament, and everyday adornment. Shaped by diverse cultural influences, Peranakan art provides an ideal starting point for this journey. Each object invites us to consider how a motif moved between regions and contexts, revealing the networks that connect peoples and how artistic traditions evolve through exchange.
Keyword_tag: Peranakan art, cultural exhibition, peacock symbolism, Asian art, heritage

title: Paradise Island at Armenian Street
blurb: Singapore Night Festival at Peranakan Museum.
description: Meet us at Paradise Island – golden hours, endless vibes. Inspired by objects and motifs from the Peranakan Museum, this hidden paradise comes to life through contemporary art, conversations, and collaboration.
datetime_display: 22 AUG to 6 SEP, 7PM—12AM; Programmes: 22 & 23 AUG, 29 & 30 AUG, 7—11PM; Museum extended hours: 5 & 6 SEP, 7–11pm
Keyword_tag: Night festival, Peranakan Museum, Armenian Street, art, culture

title: Peacock Power: Beauty and Symbolism Across Cultures
blurb: Dazzling feathers symbolise beauty, power across Asia.
description: The peacock, with its dazzling feathers and spectacular tail, has long symbolised beauty, power, and divinity across Asia. Its image travelled widely, inspiring sacred imagery, luxury ornament, and everyday adornment. Shaped by diverse cultural influences, Peranakan art provides an ideal starting point for this journey. Each object invites us to consider how a motif moved between regions and contexts, revealing the networks that connect peoples and how artistic traditions evolve through exchange. The museum showcases how artistic traditions evolve through exchange, making it family-friendly.

title: Peranakan Museum Daily Guided Tours Available
blurb: Guided tours led by volunteer docents are available daily.
description: Explore the Peranakan Museum through daily guided tours led by knowledgeable volunteer docents. Discover the rich cultural heritage and traditions of the Peranakan community, including their unique customs, foods, languages, and beliefs. The galleries showcase how cultures interact and combine to produce something new and distinctive. Learn about Peranakan fashion, which has responded to the cosmopolitan environment of Southeast Asian port cities for centuries, bringing together diverse influences. Uncover the origins of Peranakan identity and the shared elements that exist across varied expressions. Perfect for families and individuals interested in history and culture.
Keyword_tag: Peranakan culture, guided tours, museum, heritage, family activities

title: GALLERIES: Family & Community Life Exhibition
blurb: Peranakan customs, foods, languages, and beliefs.
description: Explore how cultures interact and combine to produce something new, different, and distinctive, revealing a range of Peranakan customs, foods, languages, and beliefs. Discover the unique blend of traditions and influences that shape Peranakan identity. The exhibition showcases the rich heritage through various artifacts and stories, offering insights into the community's evolution. Perfect for families and individuals interested in cultural diversity and historical narratives. Engage with interactive displays and learn about the significance of family and community in Peranakan culture.
Keyword_tag: Peranakan culture, family life, community, heritage, traditions

title: GALLERIES: Fashion Exhibition at Peranakan Museum
blurb: Diverse influences in Peranakan fashion over centuries.
description: Explore the evolution of Peranakan fashion, which has responded to the cosmopolitan environment of port cities in Southeast Asia for centuries by bringing together diverse influences. The exhibition showcases the intricate designs and cultural significance of Peranakan attire. Perfect for fashion enthusiasts and those interested in cultural heritage. Discover the unique blend of styles and materials that define Peranakan fashion. Engage with historical garments and learn about the stories behind them. A fascinating journey through the sartorial history of the Peranakan community.
Keyword_tag: Peranakan fashion, cultural influences, Southeast Asia, heritage

title: GALLERIES: Origins Exhibition at Peranakan Museum
blurb: Tracing cultural influences in Peranakan identity.
description: Explore the origins of Peranakan identity and trace the different cultural influences that have shaped it. The exhibition delves into the question of what makes someone or something Peranakan, examining the varied expressions and shared elements within the community. Perfect for those interested in cultural studies and historical analysis. Discover the diverse roots and unique characteristics of Peranakan culture. Engage with artifacts and stories that highlight the blend of traditions and influences. A journey through the historical and cultural foundations of the Peranakan community.
Keyword_tag: Peranakan origins, cultural influences, identity, heritage, history

title: Peranakan Museum Digital Resources
blurb: Explore Peranakan culture through videos and articles.

Immerse yourself in the rich heritage of the Peranakan community through these engaging online resources. Perfect for families and individuals interested in learning more about Peranakan culture. Explore the history, art, and traditions of the Peranakan people through these accessible digital materials. Suitable for all ages and interests, these resources offer a comprehensive introduction to Peranakan heritage.

title: Peranakan Museum: Discover Peranakan Heritage
blurb: Explore Peranakan culture through stories and artifacts.
description: The Peranakan Museum showcases the rich cultural heritage of the Peranakan community, descendants of Chinese immigrants who married local women in Southeast Asia. The museum features a diverse collection of artifacts, including intricate beadwork, traditional costumes, furniture, and ceramics, offering insights into Peranakan customs, beliefs, and artistic traditions. Visitors can explore themed galleries that delve into various aspects of Peranakan life, such as weddings, cuisine, and religion. The museum also hosts educational programs and cultural events, providing an engaging experience for families and individuals interested in learning about this unique cultural group.
Keyword_tag: Peranakan culture, museum, heritage, artifacts, Southeast Asia, traditions, Peranakan life, cultural events, education
